## Return Value

An array of map items.

## Discussion

MapKit JS calls this method for every `Point` object. For a `MultiPoint` object or for a `GeometryCollection` of `Points` and `MultiPoints`, the framework calls [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/GeoJSONDelegate/itemForPoint] for each individual `Point` object.

# itemForPoint(coordinate, geoJSON)

**Interface Method**

Overrides a point.

## Declaration

```swift
itemForPoint?(
        coordinate: Coordinate,
        geoJSON: GeoJSONTypes.Point,
    ): Item | null;
```

## Parameters

- **coordinate**: A GeoJSON `Point` generates the coordinate. You can use the coordinate to instantiate an item to return.
- **geoJSON**: The original GeoJSON object for the `Point`. This object may be a simple `Point` or a `Feature` with the `Point` geometry type.

## Return Value

An array of map items.

## Discussion

MapKit JS calls this method for every `Point` object. For a `MultiPoint` object or for a `GeometryCollection` of `Points` and `MultiPoints`, the framework calls [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/GeoJSONDelegate/itemForPoint] for each individual `Point` object.

## Overriding items

- **itemForFeature(item, geoJSON)**: Overrides a feature.
- **itemForFeatureCollection(itemCollection, geoJSON)**: Overrides a feature collection.
- **itemForLineString(overlay, geoJSON)**: Overrides a line string.
- **itemForMultiLineString(itemCollection, geoJSON)**: Overrides a multiline string.
- **itemForMultiPoint(itemCollection, geoJSON)**: Overrides a multipoint object.
- **itemForPolygon(overlay, geoJSON)**: Overrides a polygon.
- **itemForMultiPolygon(itemCollection, geoJSON)**: Overrides a multipolygon.
- **styleForOverlay(overlay, geoJSON)**: Overrides the style of overlays.
title: itemForPoint(coordinate, geoJSON)
